definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Betulaceae (broadleaf tree family including birch and alder)

sentences.english: B25 is an easy chair in compression-moulded birch with a surface of ash veneer.

sentences.chinese: 內蒙古樺木屬植物的分類與分佈。

sentences.chinese: 雲南樺木科植物的分類與地理分佈。

sentences.chinese: 波羅的海樺木箱體，聚脲塗料。

sentences.english: Using three chemicals to paint blotch infected fungi, then observed control effect.
sentences.chinese: 試驗用三種化學藥劑滌抹樺木被害部位觀察防腐效果。

sentences.english: In the present thesis, a detailed review of the literature was given on the Betulaceae.
sentences.chinese: 本文對樺木種植物的研究歷史作了詳細的總結。

sentences.english: A digital Scrapbook in Birchwood with porcelain caps.
sentences.chinese: 一個樺木數字剪貼簿與瓷帽。

sentences.english: The beating and papermaking characteristics of short rotating birch pulp were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了短週期樺木漂白硫酸鹽漿的打漿造紙特性。

sentences.english: The fluctuant and conventional drying technologies for 22 mm-thick Birch (Betula platyphylla) were tested and compared.
sentences.chinese: 進行了樺木波動乾燥工藝和常規乾燥工藝的對比試驗。

sentences.english: Betulin extracted from bark of birch ( Betula platyphylla Suk. )
sentences.chinese: 本研究從白樺樹皮中提取了樺木醇。

sentences.english: A carving knife with laminated steel blade with Birch and Oak handle.

sentences.chinese: 波羅的海樺木箱體，黑色半啞光粗質噴漆。

sentences.english: Alder trees belong to the birch family.
